TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class MenuAdapter Inherits WebControlAdapter Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type MenuAdapter = class inherit WebControlAdapter interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 提供用于修改特定浏览器的 控件行为的方法。

span.span: Provides the means to modify the behavior of the control for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于修改特定浏览器或浏览器类的控件的标记或行为，或充当某些功能的筛选器。A modifies the markup or behavior of a control for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 默认情况下， 控件中的对象 呈现为超链接，以容纳菜单导航。By default, the objects in the control are rendered as hyperlinks to accommodate menu navigation. 类通过实现接口来维护状态， 以便它能够在回发期间响应和引发特定事件。The class maintains state by implementing the interface so that it can respond to and raise specific events during postback. 您可以扩展 类，以便进一步自定义控件的呈现或行为 。You can extend the class to further customize rendering or behavior of the control. 对于适配器，初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 在给定请求浏览器特征的情况下搜索该控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 类使用浏览器定义文件来识别客户端浏览器的特征并将适配器映射到浏览器类型。The class uses browser definition files to identify the characteristics of the client browser and to map the adapter to the browser type. 有关 ASP.NET 中的自适应呈现的详细信息，请参阅 [自适应控件行为的结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about adaptive rendering in ASP.NET, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于适配器，初始请求会导致 .NET Framework 在给定请求浏览器特征的情况下搜索该控件的映射适配器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到适配器后，控件在其属性中保存对映射的适配器实例的引用 。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

Protected ReadOnly Property Control As Menu

member this.Control : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu

summary.span: 检索对与此 对象关联的 控件的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 与当前 对象关联的 控件。

span.span: The control associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法来引用适配器的相应控件。The property provides a way to reference the adapter's corresponding control. 当适配器与特定控件关联时，.NET Framework 将调用该适配器的生命周期方法，以取代控件的生命周期方法。When an adapter is associated with a particular control, the .NET Framework will call the life-cycle methods of the adapter in place of or in addition to the life-cycle methods of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来检索 父类的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the control of the parent class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/CS/contosomenuadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter/VB/contosomenuadapter.vb#2)]

protected public: override void LoadAdapterControlState(System::Object ^ state);
override this.LoadAdapterControlState : obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 包含适配器状态信息的字典形式的 。

span.span: An in the form of a dictionary that contains the adapter's state information.

summary.span: 加载 方法在对页面的前一个请求期间保存的任何控件状态信息。

span.span: Loads any control state information that was saved by the method during a previous request to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护专用状态信息时，它可以重写 和 方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 如果是 类，其中显示的菜单层次结构依赖于先前选定的 对象，则 `state` 提供一个名称/值对字典，其中包含菜单层次结构中的选定项的路径。In the case of the class, where the displayed menu hierarchy is dependent on the previously selected object, `state` provides a dictionary of name/value pairs containing the path of the selected item in the menu's hierarchy. `state`参数是在 之前的 页面请求过程中由保存的对象。The `state` parameter is a object saved by the during a previous request to the page. 如果控件未注册为参与控件状态，则适配器必须注册控件状态。If the control is not registered to participate in control state, the adapter must register for control state. 除了其他生命周期方法，还会保留适配器控制状态以及控件的状态。Adapter control state is maintained in addition to the state for the control, unlike other life-cycle methods.

related.span: 控件状态与视图状态示例

span.span: Control State vs. View State Sample

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnInit : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件注册为一个要求控件状态的控件。

span.span: Registers the associated control as one that requires control state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联的控件注册为需要控件状态的控件。The method registers the associated control as one that requires control state. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用 Web 服务器控件自己的 方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the Web server control's own method. 但是， 设置服务器控件的属性后，.NET Framework 将调用方法的适配器实现， 而不是控件的实现。However, after the property of the server control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用 方法初始化控件中的设置。Use the method to initialize settings in the control. 在回发过程中，这是管理与现有视图状态数据交互的重要阶段。During a postback, this is an important phase for managing interaction with existing view-state data. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果适配器重写 方法，则它必须调用基类上的相应方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则，将不会引发控件自己的 事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own event will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 与此事件关联的 数据。

span.span: The data associated with this event.

summary.span: 处理关联的 控件的 方法。

span.span: Handles the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 `OnPreRender` 类中的内部方法 。The method calls an internal `OnPreRender` method in the class. 父类的所有其他预呈现功能（如数据绑定、应用样式和事件分配）都按预期方式执行。All other pre-rendering functions of the parent classes, such as data binding, applying styles, and event assignments perform as expected. 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用 控件的 方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls the control's method. 但是，在 设置该控件的属性后，.NET Framework 将调用该适配器的方法实现， 而不是控件的实现。However, after the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will call the adapter's implementation of the method instead of the control's implementation. 使用 方法可在控件中完成任何设置。Use the method to finalize any settings in the control. 在此阶段中对控件属性所做的更改将保存到视图状态，但不会保存在方法中所做的更改 。Changes made to control properties in this phase will be saved to view state, but changes made in the method are not saved. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [自适应控制行为的体系结构概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

para.span: 如果适配器重写 方法，则它必须调用基类上的相应方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it must call the corresponding method on the base class.

para.span: 否则，将不会引发控件自己的 方法。

span.span: Otherwise, the control's own method will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostBackEvent (string eventArgument);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)
protected: virtual void RaisePostBackEvent(System::String ^ eventArgument);
abstract member RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit override this.RaisePostBackEvent : string -> unit

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 一个 ，表示菜单层次结构中当前节点的路径。

span.span: A that represents the path of the current node in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 用于在引发回发事件时维护菜单的路径。

span.span: Used to maintain the path of the menu when a postback event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当引发事件时，将调用方法 ，用于维护菜单的导航路径。The method is called when the event is raised, and is used to maintain the navigation path of the menu. `eventArgument`参数包含用于标识菜单层次结构中当前位置的菜单项的分隔字符串。The `eventArgument` parameter contains a delimited string of menu items that identify the current location in the menu hierarchy. 页将的值传递 `eventArgument` 给关联的控件的 方法。The page passes the value of `eventArgument` to the associated control's method. 关联的 控件还呈现导致回发发生的标记元素。The associated control also renders the markup element that causes the postback to occur. 如果控件呈现用于回发的客户端脚本，则会在参数中传递脚本中的参数 `eventArgument` 。If the control renders client-side script for postback, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter. 如果回发是由简单提交引起的， `eventArgument` 则为 `null` 。If the postback is caused by a simple submit, `eventArgument` is `null`.

exception.span: 当前节点的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current node is more than allowed.

exception.span: 无效声明、上次请求后进行了更改或伪造（欺诈）的请求都可能导致这种状况。

span.span: This can be caused by an invalid declaration, by a change since the last request, or by a forged (spoofed) request.

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 添加标记特性，并将表示控件开始标记的标志写入到将被发送至浏览器或设备的输出流中。

span.span: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法添加标记特性，并将控件开始标记的标记写入到发送到客户端浏览器的响应流的输出流中。The method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 对象将在方法中单独呈现 ，并将通过调用后续方法关闭控件 。The objects will be rendered individually in the method and the control will be closed with a call to the subsequent method. 若要实现自定义行为，请重写。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写方法，以便在任何控件内容（例如）之前将多个标记写入响应流 `
` 。For example, override the method to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `
`. 将 方法与方法结合使用 ，以确保在输出中开始和结束标记一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void RenderContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

protected: override void RenderContents(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);
override this.RenderContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter -> unit

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含可生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 将关联的 控件中关联的菜单项作为一系列超链接写入到输出流。

span.span: Writes the associated menu items in the associated control to the output stream as a series of hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 关联控件的对象 作为超链接写入到输出流中。The method writes the objects of the associated control to the output stream as hyperlinks. 方法是从方法调用的 ，用于对呈现到设备浏览器的标记代码进行修改。The method is called from the method and is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 控件属性应该在生命周期的此阶段之前设置，并且仅在此处完成控件的实际标记创建。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle, and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在生命周期的此阶段对控件所做的更改不会保存到视图状态。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 若要保存对控件所做的更改，请重写 事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event.

exception.span: 当前项的深度超出了允许范围。

span.span: The depth of the current item is more than allowed.
-or-
The current item is disabled.

param.span: 实例，包含用于生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法。

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 创建最终的标记，并将控件的结束标记 (tag) 的标记 (markup) 写入发出至浏览器或设备的输出流。

span.span: Creates final markup and writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件结束标记的标记写入到发送到客户端浏览器的响应流的输出流。The method writes the markup for the closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser. 特性、样式特性和开始标记在方法中呈现 。The attributes, style attributes, and opening tag are rendered in the method. 对象是在方法中单独呈现的 。The objects are rendered individually in the method. 若要实现自定义行为，请重写。Override when you want to implement custom behavior. 例如，重写方法，以便在任何控件内容（如）后将多个结束标记写入响应流 `` 。For example, override the method to write multiple closing tags to the response stream after any control content, such as ``. 将 方法与方法结合使用 ，以确保在输出中开始和结束标记一致性。Use the method in conjunction with the method to assure opening and closing tag consistency in your output.

span.span: The instance containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

param.name: item
param.span: 对象，包含要写入响应流的属性。

span.span: The object containing the properties to write to the response stream.

param.name: position
param.span: 指定的 对象在菜单层次结构中的位置。

span.span: The position of the specified object in the menu hierarchy.

summary.span: 将一个菜单项以超链接的形式呈现。

span.span: Renders a single menu item as a hyperlink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从方法中调用 以检索对象的样式和间距特性 ，并将它们应用于新创建的超链接元素。The method is called from the method to retrieve the styles and spacing attributes from the object and apply them to a newly created hyperlink element. 在方法中遍历菜单层次结构 ，并调用 方法来呈现每个项。The menu hierarchy is traversed in the method and will call the method to render each item. 每一项都呈现为超链接，并继承指定控件的属性和样式 。Each item is rendered as a hyperlink and inherits the properties and styles of the specified control. 呈现到页面的超链接是以下内容之一：The hyperlink rendered to the page is one of the following: - 用于打开或选择项的回发事件。A postback event to open or select the item. - 用于导航到在控件的属性中指定的目标的链接 。A link to navigate to the target specified in the property of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: override System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();
override this.SaveAdapterControlState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存自页面回发到服务器以来对适配器私有控件状态所做的任何更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to the adapter private control state that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 控件状态维护菜单的当前导航路径。The method uses the control state to maintain the current navigation path of the menu. 当适配器需要维护专用状态信息时，它可以重写 和 方法。When an adapter needs to maintain private state information, it can override the and methods. 如果有需要跨请求维护状态的复杂功能，适配器可能会保持私有控制状态，这与关联控件的状态不同。An adapter might maintain private control state when there are complex features that need to maintain state across requests, separate from the associated control's state. 适配器需要 在每个请求中的方法调用期间注册控件状态。The adapter needs to register for control state during the method call in every request.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 包含要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件参数的 。

span.span: A that contains an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.

summary.span: 赋予 类处理将页面回发到服务器时引发的事件的能力。

span.span: Enables the class to process an event raised when a page is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使 类能够处理在页回发到服务器时引发的事件。The method enables the class to process an event that is raised when a page is posted back to the server. 此页将传递 `eventArgument` 给 方法。The page passes `eventArgument` to the method.
